name: Cruel Arena
description: Cruel Arena is a classic arena survival zombie game. Face endless hordes and survive as much as you can, Through The Doodles and The Frames!! Will you do the best record among your friends?
minimum_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 40 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Fun game for a few minutes while I was trying to get all achievements. In Release date it shows 24th Sep 2015 on steam, how I can play it before release.
